au.com.cybersearch2.classyfts

Class FtsEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.cybersearch2.classyfts.FtsEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FtsQuery

    public class FtsEngine
extends Object
implements FtsQuery
    FtsEngine Fast text search engine with dictionary. Contains logic to return specific words from the dictionary, and load the dictionary table when it needs to be created.
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 27/04/2014

        Returns:

      • createColumnMap

        protected static Map<String,String> createColumnMap()
        Builds a map for all columns that may be requested, which will be given to the SQLiteQueryBuilder. This is a good way to define aliases for column names, but must include all columns, even if the value is the key. This allows the ContentProvider to request columns w/o the need to know real column names and create the alias itself.
